HomePage.title: All business needs, one solution
HomePage.description: Replace multiple siloed applications that result in inefficiency and are spread across the enterprise. Save time and increase productivity by bringing all teams together on a single platform.

IndustriesPage.description: Regardless of the company size or market sector, SoftExpert provides the most complete integrated web-based solution to simplify and streamline implementation, execution, control and monitoring of multiple business application demands.

AboutPage.worldwideOfficeDescription: SoftExpertâ€™s global presence, with operations on every continent, drives its growth by delivering strong, personalized service tailored to each local market.
AboutPage.recognition: An award-winning platform recognized by customers
AboutPage.aws_certification: Qualified Software Certification from Amazon Web Services
AboutPage.descServices_row1: At SoftExpert, customer service is a core value, with a skilled and experienced Service Desk Team available to assist with any questions or issues. The company offers a wide range of services, including implementation, project management, validation, web hosting, education, and technical support.
AboutPage.descServices_row2: SoftExpert ensures successful project execution using its proven methodology, reducing implementation time and risks while customizing solutions to meet customer needs. The hosting service provides the infrastructure, support, and management needed to operate SoftExpert solutions remotely, lowering IT costs and enhancing performance.
AboutPage.descServices_row3: In addition, SoftExpert Hosting Service provides the infrastructure, support, and management needed to remotely operate SoftExpert solutions. This helps customers reduce IT costs while improving application performance and efficiency.
AboutPage.extendERPDesc_row1: A well-functioning ERP system is today a must to run your company efficiently , integrating operations such as financials, sales, purchasing, production, logistics, etc. However, clearly an ERP is not enough as it will not be able to fit many vital business management and compliance initiatives.
AboutPage.extendERPDesc_row2: Unfortunately, most companies make this time-consuming and costly mistake, ending up chaotically relying on countless spreadsheets and separate applications in addition to the ERP system. SoftExpert Suite provides a comprehensive set of natively integrated solutions that extend and optimize your ERP system across the entire enterprise, including a single unified ERP connector that integrates all SoftExpert business applications at once, similar to what happens within ERP modules.
